segments.text: Hi ! Do you want a fill-up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which type of gas do you want ? Regular , Super , or Premium Unleaded ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Regular is $ 1.15 , Super is $ 1.25 and Premium is $ 1.39 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just fill it up with Regular , Unleaded , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want me to check the tires and the fluids ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would . Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S2
